sentences.en: Affleck catapulted to fame after picking up an Oscar.
sentences.cn: 摘得奥斯卡奖后，阿弗莱克一举成名。

sentences.en: He has been nominated three times for the Oscar but has yet to win.
sentences.cn: 他已经3次获奥斯卡提名，但从未获奖。

sentences.en: He was showered with honours—among them an Oscar.
sentences.cn: 他赢得了众多荣誉——其中包括一项奥斯卡奖。

sentences.en: It's Oscar night, and there are fans from all over the country.
sentences.cn: 今天是奥斯卡之夜, 有世界各地来的影迷们.

sentences.en: Oscar got up and tramped out of the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 奥斯卡站起身悻悻地走出厨房.
奥斯卡有一辆新自行车。

sentences.en: Oscar nominations went to all five leading players.
sentences.cn: 5名主演均获得了奥斯卡提名。

sentences.en: Oscar spoke solemnly, as from the depths of a cavern.
sentences.cn: 奥斯卡讲话很严肃, 声音好象从大岩洞里传出来似的.

sentences.en: Oscar, much the worse for vodka, did a striptease.
sentences.cn: 奥斯卡喝了伏特加后醉醺醺地跳起了脱衣舞。

sentences.en: Practically every movie he made was nominated for an Oscar.
sentences.cn: 他执导的影片几乎每部都获得过奥斯卡奖提名。

sentences.en: She won an Oscar nomination for best supporting actress.
sentences.cn: 她获得奥斯卡奖最佳女配角的提名.

sentences.en: The film —tautly directed by horror-meister Sam Raimi —is almost assured an Oscar nomination.
sentences.cn: 这部由恐怖片大师萨姆·莱米倾力执导的影片几乎可以稳拿奥斯卡提名奖。

sentences.en: The film won an Oscar award for 1985.
sentences.cn: 这部电影获1985年奥斯卡金像奖.
这部影片荣获五项奥斯卡奖。

sentences.en: The German-born photographer was admired by writers such as Oscar Wilde.
sentences.cn: 那位德国出生的摄影师受到了奥斯卡·王尔德等作家的敬重。

sentences.en: The movie was nominated for an Oscar.
sentences.cn: 这部电影获奥斯卡金像奖提名。

words.tran_cn: 奥斯卡（男子名）；（美）奥斯卡金像奖；钱

phrases.tran_cn: n. 奥斯卡金像奖（著名电影奖项）

trans.tran_cn: 奥斯卡，奥斯卡金像，奥斯卡金像奖
trans.tran_en: a prize that is given each year in the US for the best film, actor etc in the film industry. It is officially called an Academy Award.
